## Prerequisites
Please check the following before continuing:
- [ ] I have searched for [**existing issues**](https://github.com/Inrixia/TidaLuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue), including **closed** issues to ensure this is not a duplicate.
- [ ] This is a issue for the **Luna Client** and not a Plugin
- [ ] I am running the latest Luna Client version (See [latest release](https://github.com/Inrixia/TidaLuna/releases))

## Environment
 - **OS**: Windows, Linux or MacOS
 - **Client Version**: Luna client version

## Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug/issue is.

## Steps to Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '...'
3. Scroll down to '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior
A clear and concise description of what actually happened.

## Screenshots / Logs
To open console to view logs & errors press **Ctrl-Shift-I**.  
If applicable, add screenshots or paste error logs to help explain your problem.

Add any other context about the problem here.
